channel.title: Suggestion: adding holey foundations
channel.description: just a small suggestion here. adding ports/holes/snap-points in foundations so conveyor lifts can pass through the floor in an effort to have a more compact factory. similar to the half foundation or wall conveyor port from the moar factory mod or the fence floor from the fence(hazards?) mod.

item.title: Suggestion: adding holey foundations
item.dc:creator: @jdi35 Jdi35
item.description:
@jdi35 wrote:

just a small suggestion here. adding ports/holes/snap-points in foundations so conveyor lifts can pass through the floor in an effort to have a more compact factory. similar to the half foundation or wall conveyor port from the moar factory mod or the fence floor from the fence(hazards?) mod.
